snippet: Tomato Pie, a 100-seat restaurant in Morristown, does not make conventional pizzas. To begin with, in place of traditional sauce, fresh ground tomatoes are used.
lead_paragraph: Tomato Pie, a 100-seat restaurant in Morristown, does not make conventional pizzas. To begin with, in place of traditional sauce, fresh ground tomatoes are used.

headline.main: A Pie That Tweaks the Pizza
headline.print_headline: A Pie That Tweaks the Pizza
headline.seo: At Tomato Pie in Morristown, Pizza Without Traditional Sauce
